      • addUser

        public boolean addUser​(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String password)
        currently not working depends on the above UserExists method that is not correctly working we know this because of the code coverage report that does not go inside the main if of the function
        Parameters:
        id - this will be the value stored in the id column of the Database
        password - this value will be salted and hashed and stored in the salt and hash columns of the DB
        Returns:
        boolean if user exists or not

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser​(java.lang.String id)
        Removes a user identified by their id from the Database
        Parameters:
        id - a value passed in by the user to be removed
        Returns:
        a boolean value of if the user was removed or not

      • getSaltedPasswd

        private java.lang.String getSaltedPasswd​(java.lang.String passWd,
                                         int saltValue)
        Creates salted password
        Parameters:
        passWd - - the plain text password passed into the functions initially
        saltValue - - a random int that is converted to a string
        Returns:
        passWd concatenated with SaltValue

      • getHash

        private java.lang.String getHash​(java.lang.String saltedPasswd)
        Creates hash of salted password
        Parameters:
        saltedPasswd - this is the value returned from the above function
        Returns:
        a string that will be stored in the hash field of the DB
